modName: Shack of Liv Gretta a player home
summary: An \'early game\' place to lay your head down for a sleep, cook a meal and store some loot.
descriptionHtml:
Just escaped from the Imperials?  Nowhere to call home?  No money to buy a house?  Not really excited by big, free, \'game-breaking\' houses?  You\'ve come to the right place!

Situated in the derelict farm building near the Western Watchtower (where the first Dragon spawns), Liv-Gretta\'s Shack is a simple early-game hideaway.  Comprised of a sheltered bedroll, a working bookshelf, a 3-piece weapon rack, a cooking pot and some safe storage.  There may be more but you\'ll need to find it yourself . . . 

Spare a thought for poor Liv-Gretta whose murder has allowed your access to the burnt out shell - read her journal for details.

---------------------------------

Conflicts:
SpaceCore Lands Here! (oops . . . bummer . . .)

---------------------------------

Let me know if something really glitches out?!?
Enjoy . . . be well.

---------------------------------
Permissions: 
Use freely within Nexus - please do not port to Steam!
A thank you would be nice if you use it for anything . . .

---------------------------------
Credits:
BethSoft for a rockin\' game!
author: NordHammer
